headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company (TAP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Molson Coors Beverage Company on slo capital’s Substack by Justin. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TAP. Molson Coors Beverage Company’s share was trading at $49.22 as of August 5th. TAP’s trailing and forward P/E were 9.90 and 8.08, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Molson Coors […]
